title: Filipino Beef Nilaga
ingredients: ['2kg beef short ribs', '1 litre water', '1 tablespoon black peppercorns, crushed', '2 onions, chopped', '2 beef stock cubes', '2 carrots, cut in chunks', '2 sticks celery, quartered', '1 chayote squash (christophine), peeled and quartered', '2 potatoes, quartered', 'salt to taste', '1/4 cabbage, cut into wedges']
